root: ^“Deep breaths. You’re just going in to surprise her with a nice night out. Just a regular night.”
^“-tired of doing this. I’m just hurting my marriage.”
^You stop dead in your tracks and hide behind a corner.
^"“You know he doesn’t deserve you; he doesn’t treat you like I do. You know it."
^"“No! It’s not true, I love him, we’ve been through so much together and I’m not going to let you ruin my marriage. I’m sorry, it’s over between us."
^“You think I’m just going to let that happen?”
^“We’re in too deep to just end this.”
^"“You have to, or I will end your career.”
^“And how do you plan to do that?”
^“Alienation of affection, maybe I’ll slander your name. Hopefully, we can avoid that.”
^The man appears shocked. He seems to panic.
^“Yes. I’m sorry that must be an option. If you want to avoid that, then leave me alone.”
^The man pulls a knife from his pocket, turns your wife around and thrust the blade into her chest.
